item.title: iPhone Lifts Smartphone Market Shipments as Rivals Stall
item.description: Apple’s iPhone shipments are expected to grow nearly 4% in 2025, lifting the entire smartphone industry as rivals face slower demand and regional setbacks, according to new data from IDC. IDC has rais
